channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/4nPnP.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][url=http://www.AncientBlitz.com/home]Home Page[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/forums]Forums[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][url=http://www.AncientBlitz.com/play]Play Now[/url]
[size=24pt]Promo Video[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5D9tYXMjp0A
[size=24pt]Features[/size] [center] - Flawless PK - All new RS Items - Completionist cape and Max Cape - Over 20 Dungeons - All skills work including construction and dungeoneering - Over 20 Bosses to explore - Clan wars - Castle wars - Vote4Tickets - Active community - Great website - Helpful and kind players - Many shops - 5 Quests - Over 30 commands to help you out
[size=16pt]Media[/size] Jadinko Lair! [img]http://i.imgur.com/ULBXP.png[/img]
Ganodermic Lair! [img]http://i.imgur.com/o5HcE.png[/img]
Very welcoming home! [img]http://i.imgur.com/KGvSN.jpg[/img]
Many Skills including Agility! [img]http://i.imgur.com/VzsKr.png[/img]
New Items [img]http://i.imgur.com/Oyg9e.png[/img]
Portal Tab to help new comers! [img]http://i.imgur.com/1HBem.png[/img]
100% Duel Arena and Polypore. [img]http://i.imgur.com/GmNU0.png[/img]
Amazing Pk'ing [img]http://i.imgur.com/RCllZ.png[/img]
All Godwars bosses. [img]http://i.imgur.com/6EMS8.png[/img]
New Completionist Cape Emote. [img]http://i.imgur.com/t30T9.png[/img]
Join today! [img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][url=http://www.AncientBlitz.com/home]Home Page[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/forums]Forums[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][url=http://www.AncientBlitz.com/play]Play Now[/url] [/center]

item.title: [667/722]AncientBlitz | 24/7 | Active Community
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:46, topic:467579”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=584520.msg4158713#msg4158713 date=1352862421]
can we please stay on topic here? Instead of posting flame bait against each other post what is wrong with the server, what can be changed, etc etc. Not " your a sorry programmer, blah blah blah " nobody really gives a too hoots about that.

A server is truly only what the programmer makes of it. If the programmer learns something new then more power to him. Point blank.

kthxbai

more server feedback: I played the server for two days I can’t really play much more though until you fix a lot of the bugs that several players on the server have already discussed. For full details check public/yell logs etc. If you have those lol…

p.s. no idea how to train dungeoneering/summoning
[/quote]

You should know I wasn’t flame-baiting.[/quote]doesn’t matter what you call it. Continuing banter is just defamation at it’s highest. You may not think so but how would you like it if you had a server and I said your server sucked, that the owner is an idiot, and told that to all of my friends and they are like " omg thanks for telling me so I don’t play that!"

just isn’t nice babe

Read full topic

item.title: [667/722]AncientBlitz | 24/7 | Active Community
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:42, topic:467579”][quote author=kill you704 link=topic=584520.msg4158666#msg4158666 date=1352859377]

If you decide to do something original or halfway unique, be sure to let me know, kill you704.

Give me a suggestion.
[/quote]

Here’s a Thread with some simple yet unique ideas. These are free for Public use, feel free to take anything from this. No Credit is required:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


I’d love to do this,

Mining: People think of the Mining skill on a R.S.P.S. as a useless Skill and feature. This will no longer be the case. Players will be able to Mine Runite ore at level 1. At level 85, players will be able to mine "Extreme Crafting Ore". This Ore can be used in virtually all Skills that require materials to make items. It can be substituted once every hour to replace ANY ingredient required to make something. For example, crafting a Robin Hood hat. If a player has all of the materials to Craft one except they're missing an ingredient, they will be prompted with the substitution option. The Ore does not require a Mining level to use, therefore it is invaluable to all players. This Ore will be VERY hard to obtain, and will always be in demand. At level 99 Mining, a Player gains the "Ore-Master" perk. This will enable players to open a new option with the Mining Skillcape Master. This new option will allow players with 99 Mining to change the way they Mine. With this option toggled, the player will no longer recieve Ore from Mining, they will recieve Bars already smelted from the Mining rock. This option will cost noted Ore to be toggled on/off. The amount of Ore required will be based on the player's total Mining experience. The more Mining experience they have in the Skill, the less noted Ore is required to toggle the option. At over 75,000,000 Mining experiece, the toggle will be free. ALSO: Dragon Ore, Bars and Smithing.
but I have no idea how to add a custom object to a 667 client like a Extreme Crafting Ore Rock. But I'll think of a way to make it happen, or maybe I will find a way to add custom objects. I think I might also do this
Slayer: Money mailed to the player once their Slayer task is completed, it takes into account how many enemies were slain, and the difficulty level of the Task you accepted. Epic tasks are Bosses only.

Easy tasks - 1,000 Coins per enemy slain
Medium tasks - 2,000 Coins per enemy slain
Hard tasks - 3,000 Coins per enemy slain
Epic tasks - 50,000 Coins per enemy slain


because I know people enjoy slayer as a money making method.
Thank you for the idea’s.

Read full topic
